23: וַיְהִ֣י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> בָעֶ֔רֶב <sup>6153 </sup> <n>And it came to pass in the evening</n> וַיִּקַּח֙ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>that he took</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> לֵאָ֣ה <sup>3812 </sup> <n>Leah</n> בִתּ֔וֹ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>his daughter</n> וַיָּבֵ֥א <sup>935 </sup> <n>and brought</n> אֹתָ֖הּ <sup>853 </sup> אֵלָ֑יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> וַיָּבֹ֖א <sup>935 </sup> <n>her to him and he went in</n> אֵלֶֽיהָ׃ <sup>413 </sup> <n>also</n>
24: וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>gave</n> לָבָן֙ <sup>3837 </sup> <n>And Laban</n> לָ֔הּ אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> זִלְפָּ֖ה <sup>2153 </sup> <n>Zilpah</n> שִׁפְחָת֑וֹ <sup>8198 </sup> <n>his maid</n> לְלֵאָ֥ה <sup>3812 </sup> <n>Leah</n> בִתּ֖וֹ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>unto his daughter</n> שִׁפְחָֽה׃ <sup>8198 </sup> <n>[for] an handmaid</n>
25: וַיְהִ֣י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> בַבֹּ֔קֶר <sup>1242 </sup> <n>And it came to pass that in the morning</n> וְהִנֵּה־ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>behold</n> הִ֖וא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>it was</n> לֵאָ֑ה <sup>3812 </sup> <n>behold it [was] Leah</n> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and he said</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> לָבָ֗ן <sup>3837 </sup> <n>to Laban</n> מַה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>What</n> זֹּאת֙ <sup>2063 </sup> <n>you</n> עָשִׂ֣יתָ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>What [is] this thou hast done</n> לִּ֔י הֲלֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>for</n> בְרָחֵל֙ <sup>7354 </sup> <n>Rachel</n> עָבַ֣דְתִּי <sup>5647 </sup> <n>unto me? did not I serve</n> עִמָּ֔ךְ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> וְלָ֖מָּה <sup>4100 </sup> <n>Why</n> רִמִּיתָֽנִי׃ <sup>7411 </sup> <n>deceived</n>
26: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> לָבָ֔ן <sup>3837 </sup> <n>And Laban</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>must not be so</n> יֵעָשֶׂ֥ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>It must not be so done</n> כֵ֖ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>in</n> בִּמְקוֹמֵ֑נוּ <sup>4725 </sup> <n>in our country</n> לָתֵ֥ת <sup>5414 </sup> <n>to give</n> הַצְּעִירָ֖ה <sup>6810 </sup> <n>the younger</n> לִפְנֵ֥י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> הַבְּכִירָֽה׃ <sup>1067 </sup> <n>the firstborn</n>
27: מַלֵּ֖א <sup>4390 </sup> <n>Fulfil</n> שְׁבֻ֣עַ <sup>7620 </sup> <n>week</n> זֹ֑את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>her</n> וְנִתְּנָ֨ה <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and we will give</n> לְךָ֜ גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>also</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> זֹ֗את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>for</n> בַּעֲבֹדָה֙ <sup>5656 </sup> <n>thee this also for the service</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> תַּעֲבֹ֣ד <sup>5647 </sup> <n>which thou shalt serve</n> עִמָּדִ֔י <sup>5978 </sup> <n>against</n> ע֖וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>again</n> שֶֽׁבַע־ <sup>7651 </sup> <n>with me yet seven</n> שָׁנִ֥ים <sup>8141 </sup> <n>years</n> אֲחֵרֽוֹת׃ <sup>312 </sup> <n>other</n>
28: וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>did</n> יַעֲקֹב֙ <sup>3290 </sup> <n>And Jacob</n> כֵּ֔ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>so</n> וַיְמַלֵּ֖א <sup>4390 </sup> <n>so and fulfilled</n> שְׁבֻ֣עַ <sup>7620 </sup> <n>her week</n> זֹ֑את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>and he</n> וַיִּתֶּן־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and he gave</n> ל֛וֹ אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> רָחֵ֥ל <sup>7354 </sup> <n>him Rachel</n> בִּתּ֖וֹ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>his daughter</n> ל֥וֹ לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <sup>802 </sup> <n>to wife</n>
29: וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>gave</n> לָבָן֙ <sup>3837 </sup> <n>And Laban</n> לְרָחֵ֣ל <sup>7354 </sup> <n>to Rachel</n> בִּתּ֔וֹ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>his daughter</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בִּלְהָ֖ה <sup>1090 </sup> <n>Bilhah</n> שִׁפְחָת֑וֹ <sup>8198 </sup> <n>his handmaid</n> לָ֖הּ לְשִׁפְחָֽה׃ <sup>8198 </sup> <n>to be her maid</n>
30: וַיָּבֹא֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>And he went in</n> גַּ֣ם <sup>1571 </sup> <n>also</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> רָחֵ֔ל <sup>7354 </sup> <n>also unto Rachel</n> וַיֶּאֱהַ֥ב <sup>157 </sup> <n>and he loved</n> גַּֽם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>and indeed</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> רָחֵ֖ל <sup>7354 </sup> <n>also Rachel</n> מִלֵּאָ֑ה <sup>3812 </sup> <n>more than Leah</n> וַיַּעֲבֹ֣ד <sup>5647 </sup> <n>and served</n> עִמּ֔וֹ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> ע֖וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>again</n> שֶֽׁבַע־ <sup>7651 </sup> <n>with him yet seven</n> שָׁנִ֥ים <sup>8141 </sup> <n>years</n> אֲחֵרֽוֹת׃ <sup>312 </sup> <n>other</n>
31: וַיַּ֤רְא <sup>7200 </sup> <n>saw</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And when the LORD</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> שְׂנוּאָ֣ה <sup>8130 </sup> <n>[was] hated</n> לֵאָ֔ה <sup>3812 </sup> <n>that Leah</n> וַיִּפְתַּ֖ח <sup>6605 </sup> <n>he opened</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> רַחְמָ֑הּ <sup>7358 </sup> <n>her womb</n> וְרָחֵ֖ל <sup>7354 </sup> <n>but Rachel</n> עֲקָרָֽה׃ <sup>6135 </sup> <n>[was] barren</n>
32: וַתַּ֤הַר <sup>2029 </sup> <n>conceived</n> לֵאָה֙ <sup>3812 </sup> <n>And Leah</n> וַתֵּ֣לֶד <sup>3205 </sup> <n>and bare</n> בֵּ֔ן <sup>1121 </sup> <n>a son</n> וַתִּקְרָ֥א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>and she called</n> שְׁמ֖וֹ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>his name</n> רְאוּבֵ֑ן <sup>7205 </sup> <n>Reuben</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אָֽמְרָ֗ה <sup>559 </sup> <n>she said</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Surely</n> רָאָ֤ה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>hath looked</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> בְּעָנְיִ֔י <sup>6040 </sup> <n>upon my affliction</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>now therefore</n> עַתָּ֖ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>now</n> יֶאֱהָבַ֥נִי <sup>157 </sup> <n>will love</n> אִישִֽׁי׃ <sup>376 </sup> <n>my husband</n>
33: וַתַּ֣הַר <sup>2029 </sup> <n>And she conceived</n> עוֹד֮ <sup>5750 </sup> <n>again</n> וַתֵּ֣לֶד <sup>3205 </sup> <n>again and bare</n> בֵּן֒ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>a son</n> וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> שָׁמַ֤ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>hath heard</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>Because the LORD</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> שְׂנוּאָ֣ה <sup>8130 </sup> <n>that I [was] hated</n> אָנֹ֔כִי <sup>595 </sup> <n>He</n> וַיִּתֶּן־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>he hath therefore given</n> לִ֖י גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>also</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> זֶ֑ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> וַתִּקְרָ֥א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>me this [son] also and she called</n> שְׁמ֖וֹ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>his name</n> שִׁמְעֽוֹן׃ <sup>8095 </sup> <n>Simeon</n>
34: וַתַּ֣הַר <sup>2029 </sup> <n>And she conceived again</n> עוֹד֮ <sup>5750 </sup> <n>again</n> וַתֵּ֣לֶד <sup>3205 </sup> <n>and bare</n> בֵּן֒ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>a son</n> וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> עַתָּ֤ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>Now</n> הַפַּ֙עַם֙ <sup>6471 </sup> <n>Now this time</n> יִלָּוֶ֤ה <sup>3867 </sup> <n>be joined</n> אִישִׁי֙ <sup>376 </sup> <n>will my husband</n> אֵלַ֔י <sup>413 </sup> <n>to me</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> יָלַ֥דְתִּי <sup>3205 </sup> <n>unto me because I have born</n> ל֖וֹ שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <sup>7969 </sup> <n>him three</n> בָנִ֑ים <sup>1121 </sup> <n>sons</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כֵּ֥ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> קָרָֽא־ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>called</n> שְׁמ֖וֹ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>therefore was his name</n> לֵוִֽי׃ <sup>3878 </sup> <n>Levi</n>
35: וַתַּ֨הַר <sup>2029 </sup> <n>And she conceived</n> ע֜וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>again</n> וַתֵּ֣לֶד <sup>3205 </sup> <n>again and bare</n> בֵּ֗ן <sup>1121 </sup> <n>a son</n> וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and she said</n> הַפַּ֙עַם֙ <sup>6471 </sup> <n>Now</n> אוֹדֶ֣ה <sup>3034 </sup> <n>will I praise</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כֵּ֛ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> קָרְאָ֥ה <sup>7121 </sup> <n>therefore she called</n> שְׁמ֖וֹ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>his name</n> יְהוּדָ֑ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>Judah</n> וַֽתַּעֲמֹ֖ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>and left</n> מִלֶּֽדֶת׃ <sup>3205 </sup> <n>bearing</n>
